name: Lots Of Swords
description:
This is a game inspired by Downwell, Borderlands and Enter the Gungeon. I'm just testing around with it and I'm not too sure where it'll go. But I want to upload it because uploading things usually helps me keep them in the back of my mind. It's barely a game at this point, but I love the creativity some people tend to have in the comments. If you have any suggestions, throw them my way.

  • R to reset the game. 
  • Left click to spawn money. 
  • Right click to spawn swords. 
  • C to pick up a sword/interact with the exit door. 
  • Z to attack. 
  • X to block. 
  • Arrow Keys to move. 

Some art has been taken from: 

https://adamatomic.itch.io/caves-of-gallet

https://adamatomic.itch.io/mc-caves 

Thanks man. <3
